title: Capybara Go Tier List
description: Explore the definitive Capybara Go! tier list, ranking pets, equipment, and skills from S to C Tier. Optimize your gameplay with our detailed guide.

introText: Explore the definitive Capybara Go! tier list, ranking pets, equipment, and skills from S to C Tier. Optimize your gameplay with our detailed guide.

data.itemDescription: Increases critical rate and damage, ideal for maximizing offensive potential
Grants a second chance by reviving the character upon defeat, crucial for challenging battles
Restores health each round, improving survivability in prolonged encounters
Provides shields and damage reduction, aiding in defense during combat
Enhances critical hits and reduces enemy defense, boosting damage output
Boosts combo damage and applies judgment effects, enhancing offensive capabilities
Enhances rage skill damage, but may require specific builds to maximize effectiveness
